=== 1.0.10 ===

* Changelog added
* Code comments added
* API Version validator

=== 1.0.9 ===

* Conekta objects were not populating their attributes right.
* Tests updated to validate the bugs fixed.

=== 1.0.7 ===

* Base64 node core library instead custom base64 code.

=== 1.0.6 ===

* Documentation enhanced and little code enhancements.

=== 1.0.5 ===

* Conekta node wrapper ready for production usage.
* Conekta node wrapper include all conekta objects including payouts.
